description: Under IPC 302, punishment for murder was defined. In BNS 103, this is retained but with inclusive language for mob lynching.
key_changes: Added provisions for mob lynching in subsection 2

topic: Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property
description: The famous Section 420 for cheating is now Section 318 in BNS.
Sedition (124A) is repealed. BNS 152 introduces 'Acts endangering sovereignty, unity and integrity of India'.
